author: wemeetagain
content: re: gossipsub testing, there's also an effort starting up by Protocol labs and Chainsafe to build a gossipsub visualizer

author: wemeetagain
content: basically PL is going to be adding some tracing infra to go-libp2p-gossipsub and we'll use that to visualize the network, mesh changes, message propagation, etc thru a web console

author: wemeetagain
content: I think there will be some nice synergies w the whiteblock work

author: trent_vanepps
content: awesome. looking forward to see what comes of it. what does the timeline look like?

author: wemeetagain
content: we're starting to prototype the web console in parallel with the PL starting an initial tracing implementation. there are no hard commitments, but from murmorings, it seems like an embryonic tool should be available in ~1 month
